column5: I don't follow follow boxing as much as I'd like. I was really hoping this was Mayweather Jr that got upset.
Boring fight, happy to see the belt change hands though. Wlad didnt seem to mind giving rounds away. No killer instinct

Boring fight, happy to see the belt change hands though. Wlad didnt seem to mind giving rounds away. No killer instinct  Yeah, I saw some 'highlights'……very boring. But yeah, a shake up is maybe what is needed to breath life into what was once something I loved to watch. I can't stand the UFC nonsense.

Yeah, I saw some 'highlights'……very boring. But yeah, a shake up is maybe what is needed to breath life into what was once something I loved to watch. I can't stand the UFC nonsense. I'm a combat sports fan, period.  My interest is more in MMA since boxing has become stale.  After the Mayweather / Pacquiao fight, there's nothing exciting left.  Still love certain fights and there's some I'll tune into, but mma has a lot of exciting matchups almost weekly.
